goal: Verify Frontend Integration of Advanced Import Features (Phase 4)

tasks.title: Analyze Backend API for Advanced Import Features
tasks.description: Analyze the new services and controllers in `commit 25e65b39` to determine the exposed API endpoints. Key areas: `AutoSchedulingService`, `EstimateVersioningService`, `AnomalyDetectionService`, `ImportPipelineService`, `VoiceCommandService`. Identify request/response structures.

tasks.title: Verify Frontend Integration in Admin Panel
tasks.description: Check `prohelper_admin` codebase for usage of the new API endpoints identified in task 1. Verify that features like 'Auto Scheduling', 'Versioning', and 'Anomaly Detection' are properly hooked up in the UI.
